trans-unit.source: Activate to also show entries for the activity that do not have any events with actual participation of this person
trans-unit.target: Aktivieren, um auch Aktivitäten anzuzeigen, bei denen diese Person nicht anwesend war
trans-unit.note: Tooltip that will appear when hovered over the show-unrelated button
show unrelated attendance-entries for an activity that are not linked to the child of interest
load all records, not only the ones from the last 6 months
Informs the user that this is a one-time event

trans-unit.source: recurring activity - record for one day
trans-unit.target: Widerkehrende Aktivität - Zeichne einen Tag auf
trans-unit.note: Informs the user that this is a recurring event
Amount of participants of an event
To whom a school activity is assigned to
Add a coordinator to an activity
Add a participant of a school-activity
Title when recording the attendance at a particular stage (e.g. selecting the event, recording it)
One of the stages while recording child-attendances
Record an event for a particular date that is to be inputted
Show more events to record the attendance

trans-unit.target: Ich kann mein Event nicht finden... ...
trans-unit.note: Allows to create a new event
Start recording the attendance of a child at an event
shows when the user has registered the attendance of all children
Button to go to the previous child
Finish entering the attendance of a child
Abort entering the attendance of a child
How many attendees were present / how many attendees were absent
Placeholder if no remarks for the attendance of a child are given
How many participants attended at an event (in percent)
How many children are without a status
Allows the user to see details of an event that took place at a particular day
Informs the user that there are no events at a particular date
Attendance of a child (in percent) or the average of the event (in percent)
How many days a child or a class was present
How many days a child or a class was absent
How many days the presence or absence of a child is unknown

trans-unit.source: Attendance data can be seen and edited in an individual's details as well as here across groups.
trans-unit.target: Anwesenheit kann bei dem individuellen Kind eingesehen und bearbeitet werden sowie hier bei den Gruppen.

trans-unit.source: Select a group of children and easily mark their attendance one by one. This works well on a smartphone to record attendance on site.
trans-unit.target: Auswählen einer Gruppe von Kindern um einfach die Anwesenheit One-by One auzuzeichnen. Gedacht für Smartphones vor Ort

trans-unit.source: Enter attendance numbers for a whole month in a table format for a group of children. This allows you to quickly record attendance that was collected on paper. However, as you only enter a monthly total for each child you cannot see attendance in the day-wise calender.
trans-unit.target: Die Anwesenheit eines ganzen Monats kann im Tabellen-Format eingegeben werden. Das ermöglicht es z.B. einfach Anwesenheiten aufzuzeichnen, die analog vorliegt. Die Anwesenheit kann dann allerdings nicht pro Kind eingesehen werden

trans-unit.source: Analyse and compare attendance for all children. To see an individual's attendance history you can open the child's overall details page.
trans-unit.target: Analysiere und vergleiche Anwesenheiten für alle Kinder. Die Detail-Seite der Kinder gibt Auskunft über die individuelle Anwesenheit.

trans-unit.source: Students more than one day absent
trans-unit.target: Schüler, die mehr als einen Tag abwesend wahren

trans-unit.note: The class a child is attending
Confirm that selected children should be chosen
Total amount of education material including a summary
Subtitle informing the user that these are the children without recent reports
Subtitle informing the user that these are the children with recent reports
Link that will take the user to a list of notes
Spaces in front of the variables are added automatically

trans-unit.source: since the beginning of the week
trans-unit.note: 'includes children without a note since the beginning of the week'

trans-unit.source: without a note within the last days
trans-unit.target: ohne Notiz in den letzten Tagen
trans-unit.note: 'includes children without a note within the last x days'
Status of the note is solved
Status of the note is 'Needs Follow-Up'
Status of the note is 'Urgent Follow-Up'
Placeholder informing that this is the Topic/Summary of the note
Placeholder informing that this is textarea the actual note can be entered into
events are related to a child
Slider that allows a user to also include events
Informs the user that the following is the status
The Current amount of a process
The target amount of a process

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to keep the current version and delete this conflicting version?
trans-unit.target: Sicher, dass die aktuelle Version beibehalten werden soll und die konflikbehaftete gelöscht werden soll?

trans-unit.source: Error trying to delete conflicting version:
trans-unit.target: Ein Fehler ist aufgetreten beim löschen der konfliktbehafteten Version:
Ein Fehler ist aufgetreten beim speichern einer Version:

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to save the following changes and delete the conflicting version?
trans-unit.target: Sollen die konfliktbehaftete Version gespeichert und die folgenden Änderungen wirklich gesichert werden?

trans-unit.source: Warning: This section is intended for system administrators only. Make sure you know what you are doing.
trans-unit.target: Achtung: Diese Sektion ist nur für System-Administratoren bestimmt. Du solltest wissen, was du tust!
Automatisches Updaten der Dateinamen von Kindern

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? This will delete all existing records in the database, restoring records from the loaded file.
trans-unit.target: Soll wirklich das komplette Backup gelöscht werden? Dadurch werden alle existierenden Aufzeichnungen gelöscht und Aufzeichnungen von der neuen Datei geladen.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to import this file? This will add or update records from the loaded file. Existing records with same "_id" in the database will be overwritten!
trans-unit.target: Soll diese Datei wirklich importiert werden? Das wird alle Aufzeichnungen bla bla

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear the database? This will delete all existing records in the database!
trans-unit.target: Soll wirklich die komplette Datenbank gelöscht werden? Dadurch werden alle Aufzeichnungen in der Datenbank gelöscht!

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this feature isn't quite ready yet. We are working hard to make this available for you. Let us know below if you need this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Tut uns leid, dieses Feature ist noch nicht verfügbar. Wir bemühen uns aber, es so schnell wie möglich verfügbar zu machen. Wenn du diese Funktionalität bruchst, lass es uns wissen!

trans-unit.note: Indicates that the user needs this feature and can send a feature-request

trans-unit.source: I can tell you about my use case

trans-unit.note: One of the stages while recording child-attendances

trans-unit.source: To change the currently attending , please add a new entry to the history below
trans-unit.target: Um die momentan besuchte zu ändern, bitte einen Eintrag in der Liste hierrunter erstellen

trans-unit.note: The class and school a child is currently attending
English as a subject in school
Hindi as a subject in school
Bengali as a subject in school
How good a student performed at a school

trans-unit.source: "To"-date lies before "From"-date. Please enter correct dates.
trans-unit.target: "Bis"-Datum liegt vor "Von"-Datum. Bitte korrektes Datum eingeben.

trans-unit.source: Result cannot be smaller than 0 or greater than 100 (percent)
trans-unit.target: Das Ergebnis kann nicht kleiner als 0 % oder größer als 100% sein

trans-unit.source: "Name" is empty. Please select a team.
trans-unit.target: "Name" ist leer. Bitte wähle ein Team aus.

trans-unit.note: How many children are present at a meeting
Percentage of people that attended an event
Shows a list of certain actions that a user can click on

trans-unit.source: Generating sample data for this demo ...

trans-unit.note: An entity is a child, note, school, e.t.c
Title when adding a new entity

trans-unit.source: Please save before entering further data
trans-unit.target: Bitte speichern, bevor neue Daten eingegeben werden

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this ?

trans-unit.note: Short description of a child's photo

trans-unit.source: filename for child photo uploaded by server administrator
trans-unit.target: Dateiname für das Foto des Kindes wurde vom Server-Administrator hochgeladen

trans-unit.note: The value is any sort of form-value e.g. the name or address of a person
indicates that a certain value is required
Placeholder when no age is set
Allows the user to filter through entities
The amount of entities that can be seen in a list

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
Do you want to save the changes you made to the record?
trans-unit.target: Sollen die veränderungen an diesem Eintra geändert werden?

trans-unit.note: Changelog, or no changelog (if none is available)
Show more information about a change that was made to the app

trans-unit.target: Neuste Änderungen konnten nicht geladen werden:

trans-unit.source: Your account does not have the required permission for this action.
trans-unit.target: Ihr Account besitzt nicht die notwendigen Rechte um das zu tun.

trans-unit.source: Can't login for the first time when offline. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Offline-einloggen ist das erste mal nicht möglich. Bitte später nochmal probieren.

trans-unit.source: Username or password incorrect! You might also face this problem because you are currently offline. Please connect to the internet to synchronize the latest user data.
trans-unit.target: Benutzername oder Passwort inkorrekt! Das Problem kann auch auftreten, weil Sie online sind Bitte verbinden Sie sich mit dem Internet, um die neusten Nutzerdaten zu synchronisieren.

trans-unit.source: Your password was changed recently. Please retry with your new password!
trans-unit.target: Ihr Passwort hat sich vor kurzem geändert. Bitte mit dem neuen Passwort versuchen!

trans-unit.source: The following processes are still running in the background. Until these are finished some pages may be slow or incomplete.
trans-unit.target: Die Folgenden Prozesse laufen noch im Hintergrund ab. Bis diese abgeschlossen sind könnten manche Seiten langsam oder nicht komplett sein.

trans-unit.source: Login may not be possible until this is completed.
trans-unit.target: Login ist erst möglich, wenn die Synchronisierung abgeschlossen ist.

trans-unit.source: Password change is not allowed in demo mode.
trans-unit.target: Passwort kann im Demo Modus nicht geändert werden.

trans-unit.source: Password change is not possible while being offline.
trans-unit.target: Passwort kann nicht offline geändert werden.

trans-unit.note: retry switching from offline to online

trans-unit.source: Please provide your correct current password for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: Bitte das korrekte Passwort zur Bestätigung eingeben
trans-unit.note: An incorrect password was entered trying to change the password

trans-unit.source: Must be at least 8 characters long.
Must contain lower case letters, upper case letters, symbols and numbers to be secure.
trans-unit.target: Muss Kleinbuchstaben, Großbuchstaben, Symbole und Nummern enthalten um sicher zu sein.

trans-unit.source: Confirmation does not match your new password.
trans-unit.target: bestätigtes Passwort stimmt nicht mit dem Neuen überein.

trans-unit.source: Failed to change password. Please try again. If the problem persists contact Aam Digital support.
trans-unit.target: Passwort konnte nicht geändert werden. Bitte erneut versuchen. Wenn das Problem häufig aufttrit, Aam Digital support kontaktieren

trans-unit.source: Please enter your username and password for your Nextcloud account. This will be used for photo uploads.
trans-unit.target: Bitte Benutzername und Passwort für den Nextcloud Account eingeben. Wird benötigt zum Foto-Upload

trans-unit.source: Couldn't connect to the cloud service. Please check your username and password or try again later.
trans-unit.target: verbindung zum Cloud Service fehlgeschlagen. Bitte Nutzername und Passwort überprüfen oder später nochmal probieren.

trans-unit.source: Please enter your password for this app, so your cloud service password above will then be encrypted and stored for future uses.
trans-unit.target: Bitte Paswort für diese App eingeben, sodass das Cloud Service Passwort oben verschlüsselt später verwendet werden kann.

trans-unit.source: The password you entered is not correct. Please enter your user account password for this app here (not your password for the cloud service above).
trans-unit.target: Das eingegebene Passwort stimmt nicht. Bitte das Benutzer-Passwort für diese App eingeben (nicht das Passwort für den Cloud Service oben).

trans-unit.source: Reports have not been configured for you yet.

trans-unit.note: Calculate the results for a report
Button that allows to download a report
